topic.fullpath: Topic :: Formats and Protocols :: Data Formats :: XML

name: xml.dom.easydom
short_description: xml.dom.easydom for python primarily behaves like any xml.dom.* you already use. Additionaly easydom provides operator overloadings which render xml processing descriptions more readable and hence less error-prone. See about 90% of your xml-code boosted.
